mapper.select: SELECT e.id AS employee_id, e.name AS employee_name, d.name AS department_name, j.name AS job_name, o.name AS organization_name, wp.policy_id, wp.policy_name, wp.work_start_time, wp.work_end_time, wp.Remark, ewp.reg_date, ewp.change_date FROM employee e LEFT JOIN employee_work_policy ewp ON e.id = ewp.employee_id LEFT JOIN work_policy wp ON ewp.policy_id = wp.policy_id LEFT JOIN department d ON e.department_code = d.code LEFT JOIN job j ON e.job_code = j.code LEFT JOIN organization o ON e.organization_code = o.code ORDER BY e.name
SELECT ewp.employee_id, ewp.policy_id, wp.policy_name, wp.work_start_time, wp.work_end_time FROM employee_work_policy ewp JOIN work_policy wp ON ewp.policy_id = wp.policy_id

SELECT ewp.employee_id, ewp.policy_id, wp.work_start_time, wp.work_end_time FROM employee_work_policy ewp JOIN work_policy wp ON ewp.policy_id = wp.policy_id JOIN employment_status es ON ewp.employee_id = es.emp_id WHERE es.employment_status = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT ewp.employee_id, ewp.policy_id, wp.policy_name, wp.work_start_time, wp.work_end_time FROM employee_work_policy ewp JOIN work_policy wp ON ewp.policy_id = wp.policy_id WHERE ewp.employee_id = #{employeeId}
